V. Micro-birth Planning & Counselling
Micro-birth planning 
Th e JSY is a centrally sponsored demand promotion scheme for promoting institutional 
delivery among poor pregnant women. Th e scheme integrates cash assistance with delivery 
and post-delivery care.  Th e objective of the scheme is to reduce maternal and neonatal 
mortality through institutional care. Th
